document_data.name: Circle Singer
document_data.mainbody: '''Circle singers''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Angharradh]], the One and the Three.
document_data.Culture: All circle singers were [[elves]] or [[half-elves]], with the vast majority being [[moon elves]].
document_data.Abilities:
Circle singers cooperated with [[cleric]]s of [[Hanali Celanil]], [[Aerdrie Faenya]], and [[Sehanine Moonbow]] to summon powerful [[magic]].

In addition to their normal [[spell]]s, circle singers could cast ''[[ring of hands]]'', ''[[mystic transfer]]'', ''[[sanctify]]'', ''[[line of protection]]'', ''[[unearthly choir]]'', ''[[Focus (spell)|focus]]'', ''[[fortify]]'', ''[[uplift]]'', ''[[meld]]'', ''[[thoughtwave]]'',  ''[[the great circle]]'' , ''[[spiritual wrath]]'', and ''[[spirit of power]]'' once per [[tenday]].
document_data.Possessions: The types of weapons wielded by circle singers, as well as the [[armor]] they wore, varied greatly.
